api_list.name: Login
api_list.description: Improve your user experience and engagement with our API

api_list.name: Create User
api_list.description: Each Suggestic partner/client has the ability to create their own set of users.

api_list.name: Remove a Meal Plan
api_list.description: Use the **removeMealPlan** mutation to remove the current and following days in the profile's meal plan. Therefore, it is not possible to delete meal plans which dates have already passed.

api_list.name: Generate a Simple Meal Plan
api_list.description: Suggestic meal plan API finds the best recipes for your user's dietary plan according to their food preferences and goals. The API has different services and parameters that let you specify how these meal plans are generated.

api_list.name: Login
api_list.description: Improve your user experience and engagement with our API
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://suggestic1.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/login"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "suggestic1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
